bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.dagger.name: Dagger
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.dagger.description: A basic ground unit. Useful in swarms.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.titan.name: Titan
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.titan.description: An advanced armored ground unit. Uses carbide as ammo. Attacks both ground and air targets.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Ghoul Bomber
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.wraith.name: Wraith Fighter
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.fortress.name: Fortress
bundle_zh_TW.properties.unit.revenant.name: Revenant
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.dense-alloy-wall-large.description: A standard defensive block.\nAdequate protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.smelter.description: Burns coal for smelting copper and lead into dense alloy.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.arc-smelter.description: Smelts copper and lead into dense alloy by using an external power source.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.solidifer.description: Cools lava to stone at a fast pace.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.biomattercompressor.description: Compresses biomatter in order to retrieve oil.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.centrifuge.description: More efficient than the separator, but also more expensive to build and requires power.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.dart-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a basic fighter aircraft.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.command-center.description: Allows changing friendly AI behavior. Currently, attack, retreat and patrol commands are supported.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.alpha-mech-pad.description: When given enough power, rebuilds your ship into the[accent] Alpha[] mech.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.itemvoid.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.block.powervoid.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.liquid.lava.description: Can be transformed into[LIGHT_GRAY] stone[], used for generating power or used as ammo for certain turrets.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_zh_TW.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.
